backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functions or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented marketing-site features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining root OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML shell defining metadata, root mount point, and script entry for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing all marketing sections along with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: About section describing the agency’s background and listing four core values in card layout.
CTA section with an email capture form, styled content, and trust indicators.
Hero banner with marketing copy, scroll actions, trust indicators, and visual stats.
Renders the privacy policy section including dated notice and detailed policy content.
Displays a four-step marketing process using styled cards and descriptive text.
Shows key business metrics with icons to highlight credibility and achievements.
Wrapper component that applies variant-based section styling and layout.
Service listing section with cards detailing offerings, features, and a scroll-to-contact action.
Renders a testimonials section with cards, star ratings, avatars, and text using static testimonial data.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Footer component showing brand info, service/company/legal links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Sticky header with scroll-based styling, navigation items, mobile sheet menu, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks when backend methods are added.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, typography, utilities, and custom components for layout and UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color mappings to CSS variables, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current feature requirements, known issues, and the overall UI/UX revamp goals.
